description: Ebby Halliday, Realtors’ 190 - Richardson Office is a state-of-the-art facility located at State Highway 190/George Bush Turnpike at Jupiter Road. This regional office is ideally situated minutes from the new $1.5 billion CityLine mixed-use, transit-oriented development at the corner of U.S. Highway 75 and the Bush Turnpike. CityLine includes 2 million square feet of office space for State Farm Insurance as well as additional space for such prominent clients as Raytheon Corp. This world-class development will ultimately include 5 million square feet of office space, an integrated healthcare facility, nearly 4,000 multifamily units, two hotels, and 300,000 square feet of retail and restaurants.

The 190 - Richardson Office is also near the internationally recognized Telecom Corridor, home to more than 600 technology firms, and the popular Firewheel Town Center. Our staff of professional, experienced Associates can assist you with new construction or pre-owned homes in rapidly expanding master-planned communities such as Firewheel Golf Community, Sherrill Park Golf Course Community, Canyon Creek Country Club, The Greens at Firewheel, Spring Park, Woodbridge, Waterview, The Retreat, Breckinridge Park, Hills of Breckinridge, Provence and many others. If you want to live in Richardson, Garland, Rowlett, Sachse, Wylie, Murphy, Plano, Allen, Lucas, Lovejoy, Parker, or North Dallas, or enjoy country living on acreage property, 190 - Richardson is the Ebby Halliday office for you. The neighborhoods we serve feature award-winning school districts, prestigious municipal golf courses and nearby parks and recreational facilities.

The area’s higher-education institutions, which include The University of Texas at Richardson, provide unique opportunities for continuing adult education. Newly expanded health care facilities, including Methodist Health System’s new $120 million regional hospital, also make this area very attractive to prospective residents. As a resident of this special region of the Dallas-Fort Worth metroplex, you’ll enjoy more than 100 acres of wildflowers in parks and medians and along highways and roadways as a result of communities and businesses working together.

title: REALTOR
description: Aaron believes in hard work, creativity, integrity, and attention to detail. He strives to provide the best service possible to not only earn a client for life, but hopefully a friend as well.

Aaron’s character and commitment are second to none. With 20+ years of professional sales experience, hundreds of clients and millions of dollars of business conducted, you and your home are in good hands with Aaron.

Having lived nearly his entire life in North Texas, Aaron is deeply connected to the DFW real estate market and local community. When Aaron is not conducting real estate transactions, you may find him volunteering, on a walk or run with his wife and two labs in his neighborhood, on a long bike ride, or playing frisbee golf at a local park. Raising money and awareness to support the National MS Society to help bring an end to MS is also very important to Aaron.
Aaron is a graduate of Richardson High School and the University of North Texas, holding a bachelor's degree in Business Administration with a focus in marketing.

title: REALTOR
description: As a Texas native and Texas A&M University graduate, I strive to demonstrate the highest level of integrity and commitment in my community. I recognize to purchase and/or sell a home is a personal and complex experience. My degree in Sport Management/Marketing combined with 6 years of experience in luxury sales, provides my clients cutting edge marketing strategies in their real estate endeavors. I want my clients to not only walk away with successful transactions, but to have gained knowledge of this fast paced industry.

Growing up in Coppell, Tx and moving to the countryside in Grayson County, I have seen the growth in North Texas. Not only am I familiar within the DFW metroplex, I am also familiar with the surrounding regions. As an expert in urban and rural areas of North Texas, I provide my clients with an advantage to identify all possible lifestyles and investments.
Now is always a good time to seek out your possibilities, if you are interested in selling, buying, or investing, please do not hesitate to reach out.

title: Group
description: Darrah Adamcik, Becca Davis,  and Tiffany Ringsdorf have formed a partnership to further enhance their ability to provide quality real estate services. The Adamcik Group strives to achieve the utmost client satisfaction through communication, attention to detail, delivering results, and creating long-lasting relationships.

The Adamcik Group’s experience and achievements ensure that your real estate goals will be heard, understood and executed. We understand the gravity of purchasing real estate and our commitment to you as our client goes long past the purchase or sale of your home.

title: REALTOR
description: In the real estate business since 1979, I’ve proudly been recognized as an ongoing Top Producer, Companywide Leader and regular Honor Roll Recipient. I have the in-depth experience, focus and local market knowledge to help you achieve all of your real estate goals.

Born and reared in Atlanta, Georgia, I’m a true Southern Belle. I was taught to always treat everyone with respect and many of my clients become lifelong friends. My business philosophy is simple - to always put my clients’ needs first.

Buying or selling a home is a complicated and emotional process. I use specialized tools and ongoing education to stay in tune with the latest innovative technology. I use honesty and integrity as the foundation to continually serve and guide my clients through every step in the process.
I would be honored to help you, your family and friends with all your real estate needs.
- Residential Luxury Home Market, Pre-Owned and New Construction
- Georgia and Texas
- CRS, CRM, GRI
- Fluent in Spanish

title: REALTOR
description: Aimee Hendrix is one of North Dallas' most trusted and top-selling Realtors, counting among her clients numerous distinguished business and community leaders. A member of Ebby-Halliday

Realtors since January of 2018, Aimee works with individuals, families, relocations, and corporate clients to find and sell the best homes for the best prices available.Aimee is ranked among the best Realtors in Frisco. Not only for her sales record, but because of her attention to her clients' needs. Aimee works tirelessly on behalf of her clients and will always provide honest feedback. She has firsthand knowledge of Frisco and the surrounding areas because she is a long-time Frisco resident. She has a love and passion for real estate that is unmatched in the industry.Aimee utilizes the latest technologies when listing a home on the market, and partners with state-of-the-art drone and aerial photographers, in addition to ensuring the interior of her listings shine by partnering with top home stagers and interior decorators.Aimee has been awarded the prestigious honor of mentoring newly licensed agents. She has the New Home Sales Agent Certification, and was honored by Ebby for being a top producer each year.
When she isn’t working, Aimee enjoys spending time with her husband and two sons. She has been an active member of the PTA, and volunteers at school and within her church community.

Aimee knows firsthand how difficult it is to move and to relocate to another state. Growing up, she moved 14 times in 8 years and has relocated on four different occasions during her adult life. She is attentive to her clients' needs and is dedicated to making their real estate experience run as smoothly as possible. If you are buying your first home, selling your third home or relocating to or from North Texas, Aimee will be by your side, guiding you along the way. Whether your move is across the street or across the country, call Aimee today and let her manage your next move with honesty, integrity, and professionalism.

title: REALTOR
description: To say Aiysha has a driven passion is an understatement for this Realtor! With over 15 years of experience within a competitive industry she is certain to make your real estate journey run smoothly. From attentive and passionate searches for the right property to high pressure negotiations Aiysha puts you and your family first and will only work for your best interest. Relocating to the Dallas area with her husband’s employment as a professional football athlete her family grew to rapidly fall in love with all the town offered. With almost 20 years in the DFW Metroplex, her wide reaching network of connections in all the right fields of services makes her top-notch in matching the right vendor to client need. From beginning to end, Aiysha has you covered.

In her free time, Aiysha is an avid fan of her alumni, LSU (GEAUX TEGERS), where she played basketball and even went on to be drafted into the WNBA. Even with basketball in her roots, she and her husband spend many weekends cheering on their favorite football team, DEM BOYZ! You will often find them both watching their active kids participating in local sports.  Aside from that, Aiysha and her husband love to travel when they can, assisting others through volunteer work, and flat out spoiling the family dog!
So when you’re ready to make the call, contact Aiysha for all your real estate needs!

title: REALTOR
description: Aja's love for real estate, attention to detail and her direct and honest approach help position her as a well-respected REALTOR® in the North Collin County real estate community. Aja offers clients an outstanding level of professional services. She has an open line of communication between herself and clients, making answering the phone, responding to text and emails a top priority when working with clients and cooperating agents. Aja understands the planning and coordination it takes to move across the street or across the country. She has lived in four states and thirteen different cities and understands the ups and downs involved in a move across the street or across the country.

Her compassion for her clients shows through constant support and guidance from the first communication to the closing table. In a competitive market, having an agent with the most up-to-date market knowledge is key. Aja is continually taking courses and attending local seminars to stay current with today's ever-changing market. Whether you are looking to buy your first home or sell your last, Aja has the market knowledge, professionalism and skills to get you moved in, or out, of your next home!

After living in North Oak Cliff near downtown Dallas for nearly 9 years, Aja now resides in the Dallas suburb of Prosper. These two vastly different types of city living make her well versed in everything from historic homes in Dallas's most urban areas to new construction in a master planned community and everything in between.

Aja is also a living donor. In November 2016 she donated a kidney to a friend with three young boys. She is passionate about spreading their success story to others in hopes that by sharing her experience, it will raise awareness of the need of organ donation and save more lives. Before earning her real estate license in 2005, Aja was a 5th grade English teacher in Phoenix, Arizona. She earned her Bachelor of Science in Education from Texas Christian University (TCU) in Fort Worth. She also has her ABR & GRI designations which indicate she's an Accredited Buyer's Representative and a Graduate of the REALTOR® Institute operated by the National Association of REALTORS®, in which she is a member. She is also a member of the Texas Association of REALTORS® as well as her local affiliation with Collin County Association of REALTORS® and MetroTex Association of REALTORS®. Lastly, Aja is also the co-founder and chair of the Prosper/Celina Business Development Meeting and Tour whose purpose is to provide education to the local real estate community and provide an opportunity to preview new listings to better know the market.

title: REALTOR
description: My wife has been in real estate for 15 years. And, I’ve been around real estate since I was 4. That's when my dad became a real estate agent and he sold and brokered for over 75 years. Countless family dinner conversations have been about discount points, surveys, amendments, and closing costs.
I am thrilled to be with Ebby, one of the largest and most respected real estate agencies in the world. If Ebby is good enough for Warren Buffett, that means you and I can trust this great company.

What I bring to you is over 40 years of world-class marketing and sales experience with some of the largest companies on earth. I’ll manage the marketing of your home or property and bring the best prospects to you for as efficient and optimum a transaction as possible.

I am active in our neighborhood association and our church, and I manage a charity that supports the U.S. military deployed around the world. I’m also a sports nut, love to coach baseball, play golf and try to keep up with our greyhound rescue Bullitt.

title: REALTOR
description: A licensed real estate agent since 2001 and multi-million dollar producer, Alan has had the privilege of helping a great many people achieve their dream of homeownership. Working exclusively by referral, he relies on devoting his time to his clients' needs and building strong relationships so when they or friends and family wish to purchase a new home, he's the one they call.

This has proven to be extremely successful so, several years ago, Alan hired a transaction coordinator and an executive assistant to handle the extensive behind the scenes tasks and activities inherent in his position as a top producer. The result? More time to spend dedicating himself to his top priority--the client!

Alan hosts several client events throughout the year, most notably his Annual Thanksgiving Pie PartyNight at his home.  This has become an annual traditions.  Clients love coming by to nosh on appetizers and share holiday cheer when they pick up the pie of their choice before Thanksgiving.  Other clients events include A Night at the Roughriders Game, Movie Nights, and Meet me at Yogurtland.
When Alan is not helping his clients, he is busy travelling, snow skiing, and doing home improvement projects.  His passion, however, is studying classical piano.

title: REALTOR
description: Proven Record of Success, Years of Experience, Award-Winning
CLIENT SERVICE-ORIENTED

Customer service is key! Contact ALAN day or night. he is always available for you. We know that selling or buying a home can be very stressful. Alan's personal touch and positive attitude will ensure that you make your transition with ease. No transaction is too large or too small for ALAN LEVY, with 31+ years of Dallas award-winning experience under his belt. From dealing with the subtle aspects of selling your existing home to finding you the right home in the perfect community, ALAN strives to make your purchase wrinkle-free.
HOMEBUYERS AND EMPTY NESTERS

ALAN LEVY has combined his dedication and experience to impact the luxury and mid-range market in the North Dallas area. ALAN'S ability to listen and understand his client's needs have allowed him to continuously achieve his client's goals and expectations. ALAN consistently builds and maintains solid relationships, which explains why his business has grown primarily from referrals and repeat clients. With the large population of BABY-BOOMERS and RETIREES interested in downsizing, ALAN stands ready to help our empty nesters and senior clients with COMPASSIONATE selling and buying decisions that affect them as the seasons of their lives change.
PERSONALIZED RELOCATION SPECIALISTS

There are many wonderful communities in the Dallas area. Finding the right one for you is a challenge when you're coming from another region. ALAN LEVY will help you understand all the OPPORTUNITIES from the different cities and pretty neighborhoods to the various styles of homes and types of dwellings our VARIOUS NEIGHBORHOODS offer. ALAN will provide you with personalized insights into schools, transportation, amenities and more. Whether you are making the transition locally or internationally, these are very important decisions, and that's why more and more people choose ALAN to help them move here.
OUR ALLIED RESOURCES
Over the many years, ALAN has surrounded himself with the best mortgage lenders, title companies and vendors to help you lighten the load.
Languages - Afrikaans
NOTE: ALAN IS LICENSED TO REPRESENT YOU ANYWHERE WITHIN THE STATE OF TEXAS!! BIG OR SMALL, BRING 'EM ALL.
Make ALAN LEVY your First Choice in Residential Real Estate!
Alan Levy

title: Regional Mortgage Manager
description: When you decide to buy a home or refinance your mortgage, your search should start and end here. At Prosperity Home Mortgage, LLC, we strive to create an extraordinary customer experience through the efforts of knowledgeable and caring mortgage professionals where relationships are valued, and the focus is on treating every client as if they were the only client. Choose a lender you can trust to find the mortgage loan that best suits your needs.

title: REALTOR
description: Cindy O'Gorman is ranked in the top 1% of realtors nationally and also has been Ebby Halliday's Company Wide Top Producer for over 28 years.

Highly respected amongst her peers, Cindy's success is attributed to her bounding enthusiasm, extensive knowledge of the market, and focused attention to each of her clients. She is also well known for her aggressive marketing techniques and impressive negotiating skills. "All of my clients will always receive superior service and advertising. I always promise to deliver top quality and remarkable results!"

The O'Gorman Group is a team comprised of the foremost specialists in their fields. Cindy and her group of experts each contribute with unwavering consistency in providing the whole package through brilliant marketing and customer care, fully exhibiting Cindy's signature mark of excellence.

title: REALTOR
description: A native Dallasite with over 20 years of sales and marketing experience, Alice combines close attention to detail with excellent customer service. Whether you are in the market for a new dream home or introducing yours to the marketplace, you can count on Alice to make your experience in real estate a successful and rewarding one.

title: REALTOR
description: Alicia is a native Texan and a long-time DFW resident. As a graduate of the University of Texas at Austin and Cornell University, she has learned the value of hard work and commitment. After a career in engineering followed by time spent full-time parenting, applying that strong work ethic and focus to a career in real estate was a natural decision for Alicia. She understands that the purchase or sale of a home is a major life decision so providing excellent customer service that is timely and responsive is an absolute priority.
Alicia lives in Richardson with her husband and four children. Her favorite activity is spending time with her family. She also enjoys volunteering extensively at her kid’s schools.

title: REALTOR
description: As a native Dallasite, Alicia has extensive local expertise in the D-FW metroplex.  Whether you are a buyer or a seller, she has a solid commitment to the goals of her clients.  Alicia's high-energy approach ensures that her clients have a competitive edge and a positive experience.

title: REALTOR
description: I deeply value the importance of listening to sellers and buyers closely. My devoted personality immediately puts my clients first, always making myself available at all hours to be as responsive as possible.

I have the ability to understand my clients, meet their needs, and they can rely on me as their trusted advisor throughout the Real Estate process. As a natural negotiator, my ability to stay calm and focused through a potentially, complex or stressful time is always noticeable from my clients.

My passion is to offer professional service, knowledge, and expertise to all my clients with in residential seller and buyer representation. My mission is to disrupt the traditional Real Estate industry with a fresh and authentic approach, providing the best Real Estate experience!

title: REALTOR
description: As a successful, third generation realtor, I have developed the skills to ensure that my clients needs are not only met, but exceeded. I have been blessed lucky to learn from great mentors while working with Ebby Halliday, REALTORS for 9 years.  Due to my knowledge and marketing skills, I have been part of a high performance group of Realtors. I have had the advantage of living in the area for over 30 years which has enabled me to work effectively to sell and list profitably in the DFW area.

My goal is sales, but my primary objective is to build a lasting relationship with my clients.  I'm proud to have a strong base of repeat customers and referrals. My tenacity and great attitude has enabled me to earn the respect of a large client base.

The bottom line in the real estate business is working hard and never giving up until your goals are achieved. I have had the opportunity to work with a varied client base and learned how to work with builders and other complicated transactions.

Family is important to me, and I understand how a real estate transaction can affect the entire family. I strive to be my client's advocate and create a pleasant real estate experience by offering professionalism, honesty, high ethical standards and by being responsive and easily accessible during all steps of their real estate transaction.

title: REALTOR
description: I was born, raised and presently live in the North Dallas Area. I take great pride in the City of Dallas. I am very knowledgeable of all aspects of this wonderful city. Schools, local activities and events are all things that are part of making your house a home, which is very important to me. I have 20 years experience in sales, marketing and customer service. I feel very strongly about making the sale or purchase of your home as easy and pleasant as possible!

Ebby Halliday's Allen | Fairview | Lucas office is home to a dynamic group of agents and staff who provide the ultimate customer service experience. Whether buying or selling, our professional and knowledgeable REALTORS® will assist you in accomplishing your real estate goals. Ebby’s brand-new Allen location, which opened in the summer of 2017, is at the southeast corner of State Highway 121 and Watters Road. It is ideally situated near the thriving StarCreek development and offers easy access to the entire 121 Corridor. Ebby’s Allen | Fairview | Lucas office serves all of the fast-growing communities in and around Collin County including Allen, Fairview, Frisco, Lucas, McKinney and Plano. With award-winning school districts, an easy commute to DFW International Airport, exciting shopping, sports and entertainment, fine dining and parks and recreation, all the communities of Collin County offer something for everyone. Ebby Halliday Realtors is invested in the 121 Corridor and looks forward to serving area residents – and those just arriving here – for many years to come.

title: Director, Information Technology
description: Allen Johnson serves Ebby Halliday Companies agents and staff as the Director of Information Technologies. In an industry that continues to evolve at warp speed, Johnson’s lifelong passion for understanding and harnessing hardware, software, data, systems and networks, enables all to achieve personal business goals with confidence. No matter the day’s fires, Johnson directs his talented and responsive team with hallmark humor, quick thinking and a calm demeanor.

The Oak Cliff native recalls working on computers at the age of 5 when his father brought home an Apple 2c no longer needed at his office. He and his sister were enrolled in a software club that would send new programs every month, and he joined the programming club in 2nd grade where he learned the basics. He has never lost interest.

Before Johnson even started college, he began his career with Ebby Halliday Realtors in the summer of 2001. He helped remove modems from workroom computers and connected them to the wide area network. He went on to earn his Bachelor of Science in Business Computer Information Systems from the University of North Texas in 2005. Since that time, he has realized many notable accomplishments, including helping build the internal software that runs the business and managing the full virtualization of Ebby’s server environment.

Johnson is married to Ruth, also an EHC employee, and together they have two daughters. In his free time, he’s an avid “Dance Dad” helping with the busy schedule of ballet, tap, jazz and Ballet Folklorico through the Anita N. Martinez Ballet Folklorico professional dance company. He also enjoys a good board game with the family, binge watching shows on Netflix, and naturally, computer games.

title: REALTOR
description: Allison Powell has been a licensed real estate professional since 2003. Born and raised in her native country, South Africa, and now living in Rockwall, Texas. Internationally, Allison consistently performed as a top ten realtor within the largest real estate company in that country. She is fully bilingual in English and Afrikaans. She is now part of the Ebby Halliday group as a full-time, full-service realtor in the Rockwall/Heath and surrounding areas but can assist her clients anywhere in Texas with the help of her wide network of Ebby colleagues.

Allison has a passion for real estate and understands that buying and selling a house is about people, families, emotions and not just houses. Loves meeting new people and matching houses with clients' needs. She prides herself on her excellent communication skills that are of vital importance in the real estate industry. Through the years, she has built a successful business on referrals and the quality of being honest and having strong morals, creating clients for life. Striking the right balance in closing a transaction is crucial where she consistently strives to ensure that everyone wins.

Allison has a high degree of competency and professional conduct. She treats her clients with respect and fairness and assists her clients with their move from neighborhood to neighborhood or relocating to another city, state or country.
Allison looks forward to meeting you personally.

title: REALTOR
description: Alma Leal has been an active member of her community for more than 7 years now, and she continues to dedicate her spare time to give back to the community. She is a member of Kappa Delta Chi sorority whose motto is "Leading with Integrity, United through Service." Combining her charismatic personality, a passion for helping others, and her previous retail sales experience, Alma continues to thrive in what she does best. With a passion for service in Oak Cliff and other areas, Alma is ready to help with your home buying and selling needs. As a proud member of the Ebby Halliday REALTORS® family and member of the Living Dallas Team, Alma carries the values of hard work, integrity, leadership, and outstanding client service into everything she does.

When Alma isn't making homeownership dreams come true for her clients, she enjoys spending time creating and showcasing handmade polymer clay earrings. Alma lives with her husband and son, Baby Z aka Ezekiel. Let's not forget Loba, her mixed German Shepard in which she adopted from the animal shelter.
·         Associations and Community Engagement:
·         National Association of REALTORS
·         MetroTex Association of REALTORS
·         Member of Kappa Delta Chi Dallas Alumnae Chapter
·         Mentor with Las Chicas del Barrio Non-Profit
·         Volunteered with the Dallas Children's Advocacy Center

title: REALTOR
description: I am the mother of two amazing teen boys, a native North Texan, and a proud member of the Fighting Texas Aggie Class of 2001. I am also a Marine Gold Star widow, so I know what it means to serve others. My goal is to make your real estate experience as seamless as possible by providing excellent service and treating you like family. I am a full-service, full-time realtor with the experience and the market knowledge to successfully guide you through your real estate transaction.

title: REALTOR
description: Amanda, considered a "city girl, with a country heart", represents Mid-West Charm at its finest! Efficiently driven with a passion to serve, Amanda has established herself as one of the most well respected, honorably recognized, and top producing Agents spanning the entire DFW metroplex.

For nearly a decade, Amanda has dedicated herself full-time, with client confidence and satisfaction remaining #1 priorities. And it shows, considering a vast majority of Amanda's business is generated via referrals, and returning clients/investors.

Amanda is an observant listener who gains a clear understanding of each person's unique individual needs. She works diligently to ensure comfort, by handling each step of the process as openly and seamlessly as possible.
Ultimately...trust, integrity, transparency, competence and confidence are all traits you can expect when working with Amanda.
Designations - CMRS, GRI

title: REALTOR
description: Amanda was West Coast born and raised, but if you ask her she’ll tell you ‘I got to Texas just as fast as I could!’  After 20 years of sales experience, she has learned that customer care shares three key elements with friendship; trust, integrity, and honesty.  As your Real Estate professional her singular goal is to hear your needs, and match them within the market through focused effort and unparalleled attentiveness.

When my husband and I moved to Dallas, I was so impressed with how Ebby Halliday Realtors took care of us - I just knew I had to be a part of it!  They took the time to learn our needs, and they found us exactly what we wanted!  These were MY PEOPLE” ~ Amanda

title: REALTOR
description: Amber Hester offers 18 years of real estate experience including mortgage finance, asset management, and commercial acquisitions. Her expertise in contract negotiations and market analysis along with unparalleled marketing resources gives her an edge ensuring an exceptional commitment to her client's interests.

As a local property investor herself, Amber keeps a close eye on the market offering insights on the surrounding area schools, businesses, and future developments. Open communication, attention to detail, and a strong understanding of the industry are just a few reasons to have Amber in your corner!

A Texas native, Amber moved to the Dallas area from west Texas in 2002 and has been a resident of Frisco since 2013. She fell in love with the booming area and wants to help others call it home. She is a wife and mother of three beautiful children attending schools in Frisco ISD. She is active at St Andrew United Methodist Church in Plano and she is involved in various community projects such as Frisco Family Services, Frisco Fast Pacs, and Kids Shouldn't Have Cancer.

title: REALTOR
description: Over 20 years in sales and client services equipped me with an excellent foundation on which to serve my real estate clients. A strong work ethic with a focus on communication, integrity and attention to detail allow me to provide the high level of service and professionalism that everyone deserves. As a full time agent my goal is for every client to feel that I am giving them 100%.
Having raised an active family in DFW I have had the privilege of getting to experience many different parts of the amazing Metroplex and enjoy discussing favorite spots with clients.

title: REALTOR
description: There are three major attributes you should look for when hiring a realtor: competitive spirit, positive energy, and love of the DFW Metroplex. Good news… you found me! I enjoy working with a wide range of clients and their diverse needs. It doesn’t matter if you are buying your first home, your “forever” home or downsizing to accommodate an empty nest, I will always go the extra mile to guarantee you receive an exceptional real estate service.

title: REALTOR
description: I have been an active member of my community for over 20 years, and I am so excited to help that community with real estate.  With a passion for service in the Flower Mound area, I am ready to help with your home buying and selling needs.  As a proud member of the Ebby family, I carry the values of integrity, outstanding client service, and tenacity into everything I do.

When I am not making home ownership dreams come true, I enjoy spending time with my family.  I have been married to my husband, Clint, since 1999 and we have two teenage daughters.  We bought our first home in the area in 2000 and still call this community home!  We love family movie nights and watching our girls’ performances in choir, orchestra, and dance.  Clint and I enjoy the outdoors and make it a goal to hike in and around every city when we travel.  While we are home you will find us in the back yard near our pool in the summer and near the fire in the winter.

title: REALTOR
description: Amy Dungan, a current Dallas Uptown resident, has spent the past 30 years in the Dallas area, beginning in The Village, followed by North Dallas and most recently in the suburb of Coppell raising her three children.  She has served the past six years for the Coppell Independent School District as a member of the Board of Trustees and on the Board of Directors for the Coppell Education Foundation, as well as the PTSO President of Coppell High School and participated in numerous Bond and financial oversight committees.  As a Trustee, she spent time in Austin and Washington, DC working closely with representatives regarding various educational issues including funding.

As a businesswoman, she has worked with her husband and his business partner since the inception of their audiovisual integration company in 1999.  Prior to owning their own business, Amy worked alongside a local commercial real estate appraiser collecting and preparing comparative analysis, performing neighborhood site inspections and providing written supporting documentation.  These leadership opportunities along with her extensive experience in all facets of business make her the perfect person to ensure any and all residential real estate transactions are handled in the most efficient and detailed manner with the utmost in personal care and integrity.

Amy is an avid tennis player and has been involved with Tennis Competitors of Dallas, USTA and various other tennis related organizations since moving to Dallas.  She also enjoys golf, running and reading and is excited to be able to offer her knowledge and expertise in the area of residential real estate.

title: REALTOR
description: Meeting people where they are, having a genuine interest in their needs and helping them get there is what allows Amy to build the solid relationships that have made her a top producer in Lake area sales for the past few years. Amy began her real estate career at Long Cove Development on Cedar Creek Lake. This exclusive lake front development, envisioned by developer Donald J. McNamara, has earned her extensive knowledge regarding residential lot sales, new home construction, remodeling, and resales. Working with some of Dallas’s top builders, architects, and other professionals will ensure a smooth process from start to finish.

Amy’s southern charm, communication, and commitment to achieving outstanding results for her clients is evident when she says, “Relationships are more important than transactions. I believe my clients deserve more from the professional they decide to work with. I want to dedicate myself fully to what benefits my clients the most and strive to always go above and beyond to deliver a truly exceptional experience.”

At the core of Amy’s motivation is her genuine desire to deliver the best advice and outcome for each client’s needs. It's of great importance to her to have someone in your corner who has your best interest at heart. As a former teacher, she is passionate about bringing this same approach to real estate. When you work with Amy, she will guide you, advocate for you, negotiate outcomes in your favor and educate you with facts.

Amy grew up in Peachtree City, Georgia, but considers Texas her home. She has been a resident since 1999 and is actively involved with several Texas Education Foundations. After graduating with a degree in Business Administration, Amy found herself entering the corporate world working to open numerous restaurants around the country for Cracker Barrel. After doing this for more than 12 years, she decided to stay at home and raise her three beautiful children. Once her kids entered school, Amy became obsessed with how they were learning as well as what they were learning. She then decided to go back to school to pursue her education degree. After graduating from Stephen F. Austin University, Amy went on to teach 3rd, 4th, and 7th grade. Although her decision to leave the teaching profession was not an easy one, she believes teaching is very similar to real estate. “All you have to do is begin with the end in mind, figure out what it will take to get there and exhaust all options to make it happen.”

title: REALTOR
description: Amy’s top priority is achieving total client satisfaction, which reflects in her open communication and commitment to delivering exceptional outcomes and fostering lasting relationships. She relentlessly pursues the desired results by skillfully navigating complex markets, going over and above to deliver what her clients need. Her personalized service, effective communication skills, and vast networks of real estate-affiliated professionals make her suitably qualified to represent you.

Amy has a deep appreciation and understanding of the Lakewood/Lake Highlands community. For 13 seasons, she has owned and operated White Rock Paddle Co., a successful local small business in the area whose WHY is helping people safely experience the tranquility of being on the water. Amy brings a fresh perspective to real estate and wants to carry over the WHY to real estate by providing the peace of mind and safety net where clients can relax as she shoulders the burden and delivers a stress free experience.

Amy is easy to talk to with a warm, welcoming personality and keen listening ear that puts the client at ease, enabling them to convey their vision and desires. As an owner of a residential home and an investment property for over 20 years, she understands what a client demands from the real estate process. She is committed to delivering the desired outcome by providing the highest quality service, innovative marketing strategies, and a positive experience.
When she’s not serving her client’s needs, Amy loves spending time with her spouse and three young children, either at home in the back yard, traveling, or enjoying the lake.

title: REALTOR
description: Any REALTOR can help a client locate a house for sale, but Amy Schultz is passionate about helping clients find their perfect sanctuary, a place of safety and comfort that is your special respite from the world. From the first time Amy matched a client with their perfect home in 1996, she was profoundly touched and knew she'd found the calling that's been her home ever since. It's one of life's greatest privileges for Amy to help people find that special place that is uniquely resonant with what they want and need in their home. Many of Amy's clients are like family because they've worked together over the years through numerous successful home searches as their lifestyle needs have evolved. Whether you're looking for an oasis in the suburbs or a happening place in the city, whether you plan on spending a few years or the rest of your life in your new home, it deserves to be a place of warmth and comfort where you can create great memories for the time you're there. Amy's confident that working together, she can help match you with the special home that will meet your needs!
CRS, SRES

title: REALTOR
description: Amy Weatheread has been a resident of the Cedar Creek Lake area for 48 years. She has so much pride and love for the area and people who make up the community. Amy has a passion for real estate and helping her clients see the joy and benefits of owning their own home. She is well versed in many areas and is a member of the Dallas County and Henderson County Association of Realtors.

"My favorite part of the process is getting to know my clients on a personal level. Seeing the excitement on their faces at closing, whether buying or selling, and knowing I have been a part of a very important step in their life," says Amy.

Amy holds a Bachelors of Business Administration from Texas A&M, and has been married to Ryan Weatheread for 26 years. Ryan is a local business owner and together they have a son, daughter, son-in-law and two grandsons. Along the way, they have invested in rental properties, built and sold spec homes, and have purchased multiple personal homes throughout the years.
During her free time, Amy and her family can be found boating, fishing, being outdoors, and helping at their church.
If you are looking for a friendly, detailed and knowledgeable Realtor, call Amy Weatheread. She will be proud to help you and your family with all your real estate dreams.

title: REALTOR
description: Considering it a privilege to use his expertise to serve the interests of his clients, Anas Sawas combines his detail oriented personality, his strong negotiating skills and his keen eye for design to help people buy and sell one of the most important assets- their home. Anas goes Above and Beyond to provide excellent customer service. He is quick to respond and, on average, sells homes 34% faster than the average REALTOR. (source: Homelight)

Anas is happily married with 4 grown children. He is fluent in English and Arabic. Living in the DFW area since the 1970's, he owned H & M Natural Foods for over 30 years. During that time, he also opened two locations of The Organic Café (one at Larry North Fitness of Plano and one at Signature Athletic Club). He loves God, his family and helping others.
Designations - CRS, USMOM
Languages - Arabic

title: REALTOR
description: Dedicated to maintaining the highest level of integrity, Andrea has more than 15 years’ experience in the customer service. She has a bachelor degree in Business Administration and a post diploma in International Business. And one of the most important lesson that she learned around these years was to listen carefully to the needs of each client.

Andrea has experienced the challenges of relocating to a new area few times. She lived in Brazil, Canada, Australia so she can relate to people going through the process of relocating, whether it’s down the street or to a whole new country. She can relate in learning new surroundings, enrolling children into new schools, moving a business, and establishing new roots. She is really passionate about helping others to succeed in their journey.
In her free time, Andrea enjoys traveling, dancing, dining at local restaurants, staging and organizing homes and volunteering at her kids’ school and nursery homes.
With a passion for real estate and design, she brings exceptional customer service, knowledge, professionalism, and ethics to her clients!
Languages Spoken: English & Portuguese

title: REALTOR
description: As a full-time agent with a passion for exemplary service, Andrea leverages her background of working with high-profile clientele to elevate her customer’s experiences while helping them achieve their real estate goals. As a native Texan and mother of a 7-year-old Southlake Carroll Dragon, Andrea blends her background in curating luxury experiences with her market knowledge to create unmatched client satisfaction. Whether purchasing or selling, Andrea’s commitment to excellence manifests through her attention to detail, responsiveness, and professionalism. Andrea thrives on achieving her clients goals while creating an environment focused on minimizing stress and maximizing results. In addition to serving as the president of her neighborhood association, and a committee member for the Johnson Elementary PTO, Andrea is also a member of the National Association of Realtors, the Texas Association of Realtors, and the MetroTex Association of Realtors.
In her spare time, Andrea enjoys Dallas Mavericks games with her husband and daughter.

title: REALTOR
description: After touring the world as a professional singer, Andrea Wright along with her husband and two boys made Dallas, Texas their home.

From the best tools and technology to transparency throughout the entire process, Andrea prides herself in always delivering exceptional service.  She is very enthusiastic and her attention to detail is very evident in all she does.
Andrea is part of The Dee Evans Group where they have held a D MAGAZINE BEST OF 9 years in a row.  Her knowledge of the market allows for educated advice and predictable outcome.
Whether you are looking for your primary home or a weekend getaway on the lake, you will always receive exceptional care  with your real estate needs

title: REALTOR
description: Over the past 10 years I have been privileged to help hundreds of arriving foreign nationals and returning U.S. citizens buy homes across America. As a veteran of 12 international relocations, and pioneer of the credit migration industry, I am uniquely qualified to help incoming executives, international investors and their families to find, finance and buy homes in the Dallas-Fort Worth area.

Working with me means having someone on your side, and by your side guiding you through what may be unfamiliar home finding, financing and closing processes. I take great pride in enabling my clients to make confident, informed decisions, driven by data, and powered by the best technology in the business.

I’ll also provide expert assistance and support for creditworthy, solvent buyers with great jobs who may lack a U.S credit score and who need access to financial institutions who’ll willingly help. And once you’re settled in your new home, I’ll help you build your U.S. credit portfolio quickly. This can be as important to U.S. citizens returning after an extended absence as it certainly is to all foreign nationals new to the United States.

If you’re already here, and wanting to sell your home, or looking for your next one, you’ll want to work with me for my measured, analytical approach, rooted in up-to-the minute knowledge of the market and trends, and informed by local, national and global economic environments. The problem solving and negotiating skills I have developed over 30 years in business usually means we’ll be able to find a way to get you what you want.

My ability to captivate and deal effectively with buyers, sellers and their representatives means that your home will be presented to the market in the best possible light, or help you to be regarded as the preferred buyer in sometimes competitive market conditions.

Fluent in Spanish, Portuguese, and English, I hold an MBA from Cranfield University, and earned my bachelor’s degree majoring in Spanish and Economics at the University of Portsmouth. I am a devoted husband, a proud father of five, an avid fly fisherman, and golf nut. I have lived in Dallas, Texas, my now forever home, since 2010, with my wife Allison and our family.
Wherever you are in the world, let’s schedule an introductory call to discuss your needs and how I can help.

title: REALTOR® | Associated Broker
description: Whether you are planning to buy or sell, Andy can guide you through the process from beginning to end. A graduate of The University of Texas at Austin with 30 years of real estate sales and 20 years of property management experience, Andy believes in providing top-notch customer service to his valued clients. He is actively involved in the community, including the Texas Parents Association, Board Member, Executive Committee, President; 1991 Winner of the W.C. Windsor Award for Outstanding Community Service; Chamber of Commerce Board Member, Contact Club President; Northeast Texas Chapter Alzheimer's Association Board of Directors; Past Board Member and President of Goodwill Industries; Smith County Appraisal District Board of Directors; Marvin Church Finance, Trustee Committee, Lay Leader, Trustees; City of Tyler Board of Adjustments, Traffic Committee; and Smith County Texas Exes, Board Member, President.

title: REALTOR
description: Angel Willeford understands that buying, selling or building a home is a very important event in your life and considers it an honor to assist you with all of the details of your real estate transaction. One of Angel's top priorities is communication. Whether you need to sell a home or purchase a new one her first goal is to listen to your needs.

Angel has extensive knowledge of surrounding communities and current market trends. She utilizes the latest in technology and service tools for superior marketing and is an expert at negotiating all the details of your real estate contract. Angel's clients testify to her careful
attention to service and the importance of every relationship.

Angel believes that whatever you do, you should work at it with all your heart. She believes in giving back to the community and is a volunteer with Refuge City, Frisco Family Services and at Hope Fellowship in Frisco where she attends and serves.
Angel's support team consists of a listing secretary, graphic designer, advertising coordinator,

administrative assistant and on-call attorney. She also works closely with industry leading title companies, lenders, insurance agents and inspectors to provide a smooth process from beginning to end. Angel can assist you in the Dallas Ft. Worth Metroplex and connect you with top producing agents anywhere in the U.S and abroad.
Angel's Passion for People will move you!
Designations and Specialties
● GRI® - Graduate REALTORS Institute
● ABR® - Accredited Buyers Representative
● ASP® - Accredited Staging Professional
● SFR® - Short Sale & Foreclosure Specialist
● CNHP® - Certified Natural Health Professional
● CNE® - Certified Negotiation Expert
● Relocation Specialist
● LakeFront Property Specialist
● New Construction Specialist
Achievements and Awards
● Rookie of the Year Award 2009
● Multi-Million Dollar Top Producer
● Ebby Honor Roll
● Diamond, Platinum, Star, Star Plus & Triple Star Achiever
● Texas Monthly Magazine - Five Star Professional Award 2015 - 2020
● D Magazine - D Best Award 2016 - 2020

title: REALTOR
description: Texas Realtor dedicated to providing 5 Star Service!

Angela has a reputation of excellence and a desire to serve each of her clients in a genuinely meaningful way. She has a strong track record of winning in multiple offer situations, and of netting her clients the best possible outcome!

For SELLERS, Angela brings local market knowledge, staging & marketing expertise and strong negotiation skills. This allows her to sell homes quickly, for as much as possible, and with as little stress on her clients as possible. BUYERS benefit from Angela’s industry knowledge,  negotiation skills, and the relationships and resources that she has in place. Angela's mission is that each of her clients find themselves in a position of favor and that they come to the closing table confident and happy.

Angela is married and has two daughters and one son. The family has two beloved German Shepherd dogs. She and the children are Texas natives, her husband and dogs got here as quickly as they could! Angela and her husband love to travel but are always glad to get back to the “southern hospitality” that Texas is known for.

title: REALTOR
description: Home is the nicest word there is." Buying or selling your home can be one of the most exciting, yet stressful, experiences in your life. I am committed to making your experience as easy as possible. From me, you can expect professionalism, persistence, as well as excellent communication and follow-up skills.

As a native Texan and Southlake resident since 2007, I can provide you with valuable information on the surrounding areas, schools, etc. My background in education and sales brings superb listening & coaching skills while negotiating to get you exactly what you want. I have also served in many volunteer capacities from former Carroll Elementary PTO president to current HOA president. My notable work ethic & dedication will make it easy to stand by you every step of the way.

title: REALTOR
description: You will find that no day is the same in real estate and Angela is driven by a passion to consistently adjust and adapt to market changes while working to help her clients find that perfect space that they love! As a native Texan and local resident all of her life, she knows this area well and is able to show all the amazing sides of DFW. With a thirteen year background in property management, she has strong experience in real estate and pursued her goal of assisting others in navigating the ups and downs of purchasing property. With her patience and strategic planning with each client, Angela is aggressive at achieving the goals set in place while also being able to navigate comfortably at the client's pace.

Known for her communication and attention to detail, you will find that most questions are answered before they are even asked. She believes in treating others the right way and always moving forward. Goals are set high and pushing ahead is done daily, not just in the moment. Your real estate needs are achieved when she is working for you!

Outside of working hard in real estate, Angela loves spending time with her family. She and her husband of 25 years are proud parents to three children and six grandkids. When able to sneak in some extra activity time you will find her working in the yard or walking the trails in her community.

title: REALTOR
description: Angie Boyd has over 15 years of real estate experience where she has proven herself as a top producer in The Paulette Greene Group. Angie’s caring nature, diligence to professionalism, and sense of integrity has brought her much success. Angie can give you a competitive edge with extensive market knowledge, expert negotiation, and personalized customer service. Whether you are a first time buyer, building, downsizing, upsizing, or relocating, you have a personal advocate by your side with your best interest at heart.

Angie has enjoyed living in the Metroplex for the last 24 years and is proud to call Texas her home! She was born in Georgia, grew up in Indiana, moved to Florida, then to Texas. She is a proud Mom of 2 grown daughters and happy to have 3 grandchildren who live in Prosper and 1 grandchild who lives in Nashville. Her B.A. in Business, background in Retail Management, and love of building homes made real estate an easy transition.  Angie’s specializes in residential serving Frisco, Plano, Prosper, Celina, McKinney, Allen, and Dallas as well as land and lots in the surrounding areas.
Accolades:
~ D Magazine’s Best Real Estate Agent and Top Producer -2017-2021
~ Group One Real Estate Network
~ Accredited Buyer's Representative
~ Seller's Representative Specialist
~ Accredited Luxury Home Specialist

title: REALTOR
description: THE COOK DRAKE TEAM MAKES CLIENT SATISFACTION OUR HIGHEST GOAL!

Working on an equal team for 10 years, we always say when you choose to work with us, you actually get TWO FOR ONE.  Extensive knowledge of the market and relationships with our clients are what set us apart from other agents. We both work comprehensively with each and every transaction and seek to get to know your needs, wants, and desires so we can diligently serve you to the best of our abilities and help secure a home for you that you will love. We are proud to have been awarded the Best Client Service Award for the last four years running from our Ebby Halliday office. Because the majority of our business is by referral -- we have sold homes ALL OVER the whole DFW area.

We are both committed and eager to make sure you have the best real estate experience possible, whether selling your home or buying a new home. When you choose us to be your Realtors®, you will be treated with the utmost care, as if we were serving a friend or family member. We believe good communication is essential to keep you informed along each step of the transaction. With two of us, you can always reach one of us when you need us!

If you are selling, we work diligently to get your home ready to show to its best advantage - with a certification in staging, we offer this complimentary consulting service to our clients. We market your home and strive to get it sold as quickly as possible.

If you are buying, we listen to your wants and needs and search tirelessly to find exactly what you are looking for! Our job is to help alleviate the stress and make it as easy on our clients as possible.

Both of us have our GRI (Graduate Realtor® Institute) designation - Denise also has an SRES designation (Senior Residential Expert) and Angie has an ASP designation for staging.  We have both been very involved in our communities with PTA, Post Prom, Athletic Booster Clubs, Women's Clubs, Bible Studies, Boy Scouts, College, Sorority, and Panhellenic Alumni groups. Angie is a graduate of Ole Miss and Denise is a graduate of the University of Alabama at Birmingham.
We would be honored to assist you with any real estate needs! Please give us a call!
GRI

title: REALTOR
description: Angie Graham, a six-foot-tall former college basketball star, has a presence in the industry and community. As a realtor in all the DFW area, she also services the State of Texas and has worked with many clients relocating to different states.

Coming from a strong family heritage of faith and integrity, Angie exudes a sincere kindness and warmth that immediately wins your trust. As a survivor of a brain bleed in 2010, Angie beat the odds and is fully recovered. She is full of hope, and energy, and ready to be your life-long real estate professional. She has also worked with long-running charity in Dallas, Hope for the Homeless. The homeless of Dallas are always a need that is dear to her heart.
And Angie can sell popsicles to polar bears!

If you need your home sold, Angie will work with you and your budget to creatively bring your home to a higher level of appeal to potential buyers. Even better, she is a fearless negotiator who will pursue top dollar for you.

When you are ready to purchase your dream home, Angie is equally skilled at finding the home that meets your needs and fulfills your desires. Those negotiating skills she has honed will win you, as her client, the best price possible.
Angie is a part of The Miller Graham Team. This team offers the most comprehensive knowledge including superior skills in home staging and design.
Add their heart of excellence to serve, and you have everything under the sun for a successful and happy real estate experience!

title: REALTOR
description: As a 19 year resident of Coppell, I have very much enjoyed raising two children here and serving our community.  A member of Coppell's chapters of the Young Men's Service League and the National Charity League, I enjoy working with people, being creative in the process, and making people smile!  My work as a dental hygienist for the past 26 years has shaped me to be a careful, intuitive listener and proactive problem solver.  I pride myself on my trustworthiness, loyalty, and dependability. I look forward to using these skills and character traits to assist you with your real estate needs be they purchase, sale, lease, or investment.  When not helping people with what can be one of the most noteworthy events of their lives-selecting and buying a home, I enjoy being a member of Fellowship Church and having fun with my family outdoors!

title: REALTOR
description: Anna is proud to be a full-time Ebby Halliday Realtor® with a stellar reputation and ethics. She believes integrity, honesty, and loyalty are the core values in business and personal relationships. She believes strongly in continuing education to maintain professionalism and being knowledgeable with current market trends. She prides herself as an excellent communicator and a sensible negotiator with a very strong work ethic.

Anna was born and raised in China. Her bilingual skills, multi-culture background, and unique life experiences equip her for a challenging market. Her caring personality and compassion drive her to continuously exceed expectations by providing superior customer service. As a member of The Russell Group, she ensures that every transaction creates a "Discover The Difference" experience.
Chinese, English
GRI, SRS

title: REALTOR
description: With the poise of a southern bell, Anna Seideman lovingly reflects on her upbringing along the Gulf Coast of Southeast Texas. Raised with Friday Night Lights, community involvement and strong family values, she recognizes the importance in finding each client not only the right house but the right community that best compliments their needs and lifestyle.

A Lamar University graduate, Anna has a BBA in HR Management. Her experience includes healthcare, education and oil and gas administration. She has also flown the U.S. as a former flight attendant and rubbed elbows with fame as a previous NFL Professional Team Executive. Her diverse background and true love of people allows her to understand the needs of a busy executive as well as a mother of three. “So much plays into the decision of where to live or when to sell! Discussing and accessing each individual’s long and short term goals allows me to give them the best possible experience and outcome with as little stress as possible. The picture unfolds, the instincts kick in and the options flow,” Anna says.

Always willing to go the extra mile, Anna is led by experience and powered by passion and dedication. She is committed to her clients from the time they meet through the closing and beyond. Don’t be fooled by her gentle ways, when it comes to the contract, her honed negotiation skills and strong ethics are known to reap big rewards for her clients making her a strong choice for referrals among family and friends. A seasoned agent, she enjoys working with first time buyers, downsizing or rightsizing sellers, relocations and leases.

On a personal note … Anna loves spending time with her children, grandchildren, attending church and rooting for the local professional sports teams. Her dad, a young 100, lives with her and she is grateful that they can spend this time together.
Designations - US MOM, GRI Certification

title: REALTOR
description: Honesty, hard-working, extremely dedicated = 100% client satisfaction. Professional service guaranteed from start to finish and beyond. The majority of my business comes from friends, family, and referrals. What better reference is there? Strong marketing and negotiation skills help both of us meet "our" real estate goals.

title: REALTOR
description: Annette Goolsby is one of Richland Chambers Lake’s most trusted and top producing agents. Consistently finishing in the top 10% of Navarro and Freestone County agents, Annette loves what she does, and it shows.  Since 2016 Annette has assisted buyers looking to find their dream on RCL.  In fact, Annette loved the lake so much she and her husband purchased a lot, built a home and now they are “Living the Dream”!

Prior to selling real estate, Annette was a home economist with a major utility company, owned multiple video stores, taught high school interior design and housing classes, and worked in oil & gas as a Registered Professional Landman.
Known to their six grandchildren as GiGi and P-Daddy, Annette and her husband, Paul, love entertaining family and friends.
·  Member of MetroTex Association of Realtors®
·  Member of National Association of Realtors®
·  Member of the Texas Association of Realtors®

title: REALTOR
description: - ABR, SRES

I have been a REALTOR for the past 22 years working in McKinney helping buyers with preowned and new builds and sellers relocating in and out of the area. I am a full-time REALTOR and work hard to meet the needs of my clients. I have always tried to make this process as seamless as possible, keeping the clients' needs and wants uppermost in the process. My desire is to create lasting relationships long after the contract has closed.

I have lived and worked in the Dallas Metroplex for over 50 years. First in the technical community with Texas Instruments and Fischbach and Moore, and then in retail with my husband. We owned and operated various clothing stores in McKinney, Plano, and Greenville. I lived in Dallas, Farmers Branch, Plano and then moved to Weston and finally to McKinney. I am extremely familiar with Dallas, Collin, Grayson, Denton, and Fannin counties and have watched them grow into a major Metroplex.

We raised two sons and moved around in the Weston area building 2 homes and remodeling 2 others. We lived on an 86 acre farm with horses, cattle, and hay production and then finally moved into McKinney. During that time, I volunteered at the Celina Schools for 15 Years, coached soccer and helped develop a band program support group.
If you want expertise, knowledge and a stress-free process, give me a call and let's get started.

title: REALTOR
description: As a successful, award-winning Realtor for Ebby Halliday Realtors, Ann has represented and helped a diverse group of buyers and sellers throughout the Dallas Fort Worth Metroplex realize their dreams of home ownership.

With over 30 years of experience, Ann is respected by her colleagues for her knowledge of the Real Estate market, problem-solving skills and willingness to go above and beyond for her clients and peers. She possesses the ability to effectively collaborate with all stakeholders in a real estate transaction.

In addition to her responsibilities as a Realtor, Ann is passionate about mentoring and educating young professionals about the residential real estate process and the importance of bringing a positive can-do attitude to every situation.
Ann has lived in the DFW Metroplex since 1967 and currently resides in far North Dallas, She enjoys volunteering at her local food pantry and playing bridge with her friends.
Designations: CRS, GRI

title: REALTOR
description: After teaching high school classes for 40 years, I am enjoying the new challenges of real estate. It is a pleasure for me to have the opportunity to help others buy or sell properties. Give me a call and let me help you with your real estate needs.

title: REALTOR
description: It has been my honor and joy to serve buyers and sellers throughout the Dallas area since 2000. I am present, responsive, positive, and high-energy. As a native Dallasite, I love the uniqueness of the various neighborhoods and all that they have to offer. Having raised 4 children here, I have knowledge and experience with both public and private schools, as well as recreational amenities.
Buying and selling property can feel daunting at times, and I am ready to help make the process as seamless and peaceful as possible in this fast-paced environment.

title: REALTOR
description: Ann has been with Ebby Halliday since 2008. She attributes her success to loving people and having excellent and timely communication skills. Whether talking with first-time homebuyers or negotiating with shrewd investors, Ann devotes herself to listening effectively and working as hard as possible on her client's behalf.

Her first year in business, Ann won her office's Rookie of the Year award. Since then, many more accolades have followed: The Ebby Halliday Honor Roll, inclusion on D Magazine's Top Producer and Best Agent list, Texas Monthly Magazine's Five Star Professional, 32 BEST (Frisco's best realtors), Allen office Top Office Individual, VIP in Customer Service.

Ann holds a BFA from Oakland University, graduating Summa cum Laude, and receiving an Outstanding Alumni Award. Ann is a former business owner, decorator and stager. She was the founder and director of MBC, a non-profit organization. She was a 25 year board member of Macomb Arts Council and past president of Cecchetti Council of America as well as one of two delegates to the international organization, CICB.
Since Ann's husband, Dwight, was a builder for many years, Ann has a good eye for decorating, building, remodeling and renovating.
Ann's team that ensures a smooth transaction consists of mortgage lenders, title company escrow officers, and a wide list of vendors.
Experience, Ethics, Education and Communication. You will enjoy Ann and she will enjoy you! She will look out for you and see that your interests are protected. She will get results!
Designations- GRI

title: REALTOR
description: Anthea was licensed in 2004. In 2008, she was promoted to Director of Sales. She has extensive knowledge in all areas of residential real estate sales, with a very diverse portfolio of past experience ranging from short sales to multi-million dollar sales.

The only way Anthea does business is with integrity, diplomacy, and sincerity in all of her dealings. Anthea's success has also been the result of her attention to detail, strong negotiation skills, fast response, patient demeanor, and dedicated work ethic. She includes professional home staging, expert photography, and smart marketing on all listings.  She has been successful in winning offers for buyers in multiple offer situations and obtaining top dollar for sellers in this competitive market.

In 2020, Anthea made history with Ebby Halliday Companies, when she handled the largest outbound referral sale, a $15MM estate.  In 2021, she broke her own record with a second outbound referral sale of $15.5MM.

Before living in Texas, Anthea lived on the island of Kaua'i and worked as Broker-In-Charge of Hawaii Life Real Estate Brokers, as seen on HGTV's show "Hawaii Life," where she managed the agents of all 3 island offices. She has also owned her own real estate brokerage in California.

Anthea's husband is a luxury home builder in the Dallas area and is a great resource for those wanting to engage in new construction or remodels. Anthea and her husband live in McKinney and have 4 children and 1 granddaughter.

title: REALTOR
description: Welcome home! If you are looking to purchase a home or interested in selling your home, you have found the perfect real estate professional.
Antonio Elmore is a disciplined, dedicated agent who has integrity and a winning attitude.
Antonio is focused on providing the highest level of customer service with over 13 years of great communication skills, price negotiation skills, contract expertise, and client management.
Happy clients are my goal!
Designations - US MOM (Military On The Move)
