title: REALTOR
description: As a native Texan, I have a lifetime of knowledge and experience in the D-FW metroplex. I graduated from Southlake Carroll High School and attended the University of North Texas where I earned a degree in Fashion Merchandising. I played soccer growing up, but it was cut short due to a cancer diagnosis. I recently started playing again and enjoy playing in numerous leagues in the area. My husband of almost 20-years and I have three boys that attend Northwest ISD. In my free time, I love spending time with my family, which includes my four brothers and one sister.

My career in real estate began as the Listing Coordinator for Ebby's Southlake office. While I thoroughly enjoyed helping other agents successfully market and sell properties, I decided I wanted to be more involved with home buyers and sellers. Helping people has always been one of my passions, and my knowledge and expertise in this area sets me apart. I enjoy being a Realtor and can't wait to help you with your real estate needs!

title: REALTOR
description: April is a long-time resident of the DFW area who’s passionate about helping her clients live the life they
want in the home they’ve always imagined. Whether they are transitioning to their next perfect home,
relocating to another state, or are first time homebuyers, April cherishes the opportunity to help in their journey.
April is a graduate of Louisiana State University and holds a Masters in Business Administration from the
University of Texas at Dallas. She spent 15 years at major consumer packaged goods companies working in marketing and business to business sales before deciding to pursue her real estate passions.
April is thrilled to pair her skills in client service, negotiations and pricing with Ebby’s people first culture and long tradition of elevating the real estate experience.
April is a wife and mother of three. In her free time, you can find her helping her son perfect his baseball
swing or doing an art project with her girls.

title: REALTOR
description: My father is a contractor so my love for real estate first started there. I had the opportunity to see many homes and assisted with remodeling and repairing them. I am passionate about seeing a vision in something and following through with the process until it’s finished and that is why I chose to become a real estate agent.

I want to be the real estate agent people consider first when they are interested in conducting a real estate transaction. My favorite aspect of my job is getting to provide proper guidance to those who are looking to purchase/own a home(s).

My top priority is to ensure the best possible service while paying attention to the wants and needs of my clients. My personal motto would be to never give up and find things that challenge you to become a better version of yourself. My promise is to help you locate your forever home.

title: REALTOR
description: With a commitment to excellence and strong work ethic, this Dallas native and top-performing Realtor offers clients unrivaled representation in a dynamic real estate market. Arden’s real estate expertise is backed by an incredible level of specialized training that included six certifications and counting. The most recent designations earned is the Certified International Property Specialist (CIPS), which enables Arden to mirror Ebby Halliday, Realtors position of being both local and global. Arden is equally passionate about her community, and serves on the Board of the Friends of Northaven Trail. Arden’s clients call her “over-the-top awesome” when it comes to describing a Realtor who is ideally qualified to help make the very best choice about the next place to call home.
Advanced industry training and education:
Magna Cum laude Graduate, University of North Texas
Graduate Realtor Institute
Leadership MetroTex
GREEN designation
Advance Historic Home Specialist
Certified International Property Specialist (CIPS)
Community connectivity:
Friends of Northaven Trail board member
Les Fleurs Des Jeunes Garden Club
Dallas Arboretum
Dallas Women’s Forum
Preservation Dallas
Global Business Council Committee

title: REALTOR
description: Arlene Lawley has twenty-plus years of successful experience in real estate and has been honored as a leader in the industry. She is recognized by clients and associates for her professionalism, reliability, consistency and timeliness with meeting their real estate needs. Arlene has been an active member of numerous community and professional organizations serving as president of Women's Council of Realtors, Women's Committee-Ecumenical Center, and as a member of Realtor Board of Professional Standards, Grievance and Builder's Committees. She finds great satisfaction in knowing that she has been able to help her clients find a new home or sell one quickly and effectively while maximizing the return on their investment and making the entire selling, buying, and moving process as smooth and pleasant as possible. It is her honor and privilege to provide the very best service and to educate her clients on the information necessary to make informed decisions.
Designations - ABR, CRS, E-PRO, GRI, SRES

Ebby Halliday's Arlington office is located midway between Dallas and Fort Worth and has more than 60 associates available to offer you the finest in residential real estate services. Our professional and accomplished staff is on the cutting edge of real estate marketing trends, and specializes in the Arlington area--which is currently the seventh-largest city in Texas. Conveniently situated off Interstate 30, Arlington offers residents one of the best school systems in the state. The Ball Park at Arlington where the Texas Rangers play, major shopping and entertainment venues, two municipal airports, and is only 10 miles away from Dallas/Fort Worth International airport--one of the largest in the country.

title: REALTOR
description: Ashley McGhee is a native of Ft. Worth, TX,  who graduated from the University of Colorado at Boulder with a degree in English Literature. She lives with her partner Joe, and her 2 beloved Lab Retrievers: Timber and Patsy Cline. Ashley's favorite part of her job is her strength in building rapport, negotiation, and creating ideal client-focused solutions that are strongly blended with her belief that cherished memories are created in the home. Her passion for the Real Estate business is derived from knowing her clients are in caring and capable hands while making a major life decision. She has a strong working knowledge of current and past housing market trends, combined with exemplary communication skills- and professionalism that make her an indispensable asset to clients looking to buy, sell or lease their new home. As a licensed Texas Realtor, she will craft a seamless experience from start to finish for her clients: a foundation built on trust, honesty, and integrity.

title: Group
description: Service. Experience. Tenacity. Details. Results. Satisfaction.

Words mean something.  You deserve the gift of Next Step Residential Group and our more than three decades of proven client satisfaction.  In today’s competitive environment, a passing referral or family commitment might not get the job done. After all, the job requires more than good luck and timing. Are you ready to take the Next Step to enjoy an experience beyond expectation?  Call us today.

title: REALTOR
description: “Learn from the Past; Prepare for the Future; and Live in the Moment” are the affirmations I live by. As a native Texan and longtime resident of the Sachse/Wylie area, I offer an intimate understanding of the local market and what makes each community unique.

I am a solution-oriented, trustworthy and highly reliable real estate agent who is passionate about helping people achieve their goals and live their best lives. I bring an innovative and hands-on approach to every transaction and work tirelessly to ensure my clients get the best homes and deals available. I maintain a positive attitude and tackle every challenge head-on – and with an open mind. My keen attention to detail and exceptional listening skills are my greatest strengths.

Before entering the real estate profession, I worked with sales agents in Annuities. My background in finance and property management enables me to expertly guide clients to make informed and sustainable decisions. I have gained vital organizational, analytical, financial and project-management skills.

I am a proud to be part of Ebby Halliday Realtors, where I work alongside a team of passionate and highly skilled agents committed to providing premium real estate services. I attended Eastfield College and University of Phoenix. My clients love working with me because of my honesty and ability to cultivate immediate rapport. Whether you are buying or selling, you can rest assured that I will devote every effort to delivering excellent results, always with your best interests in mind.
Outside of real estate, I am a proud mother of four beautiful children and spend my free time watching movies, spending time with family and learning to play the piano and cello.

title: REALTOR
description: Austin Murphy is a native Texan who graduated from Texas A&M University-Commerce with a degree in Sports Management. He has worked in professional sports for the Texas Rangers and Miami Dolphins. Austin brings high energy, professionalism, and exceptional client care into his real estate business. Austin has a deep appreciation for his clients and works diligently to protect their investment and ensure professional representation at every aspect of the transaction. In his downtime, Austin enjoys outdoor activities, traveling with his girlfriend, and Sunday dinners with his family.

title: REALTOR
description: Hi, my name is Autumn Martin and I am a Realtor with The Mauelshagen Group, Ebby Halliday, REALTORS. My team and I have the resources and network to help you buy, sell or lease your dream home!

title: REALTOR
description: I provide experienced, knowledgeable, reliable quality service to all my buyers and sellers. I specialize in understanding my clients' needs and OPENING THE DOOR TO THEIR DREAM HOME. Dedication, patience and state-of-the-art technology allow me to make each client a priority. Motivation, determination and high energy ensure that I achieve goals within the clients' relocation time frame.
Designations - ABR, CNHS, E-PRO, GRI

title: Group
description: Keith Ayres, Mitzy Ferguson, Jill Smith, and Jack Mallouf have formed a partnership to further enhance our ability to provide comprehensive, multifaceted real estate services.  We strive to achieve client satisfaction that exceeds expectations by listening thoroughly, understanding your needs and delivering results.
Our success with negotiations involving:
Pre-Owned Homes
New Construction
Relocation
Investment Properties
Our experience ensures we have the experience and knowledge to address your specific needs and customize a program designed to meet your goals.
Your home is a long-term investment and our commitment extends well past the purchase or sale of your home.  Consider us a resource if you need reliable referrals for:
We welcome the opportunity to meet with you and discuss how our approach and experience can help achieve your real estate goals.
Designations - ABR, SRES, GRI

title: REALTOR
description: After attending The University of Texas at Arlington and receiving a Bachelor of Business Administration in Management and Marketing, Baldemar decided to combine his passion for helping others with his love for DFW and pursue a career in real estate.

As a Realtor, his primary goal is to serve his clients and make their real estate goals his number one priority. Baldemar takes the time to truly get to know each of his clients so he can understand what they’re looking for, and he is available at every step of the process to answer any questions or address any obstacles.

In addition to being an incredibly detail-oriented and results-driven individual, he is fluent in both English and Spanish, allowing him to help an even more extensive client base. Baldemar is eager to grow as a Realtor and takes any opportunity he can to further his knowledge and expand his expertise.

title: REALTOR
description: Barbara brings a wealth of business experience to Ebby Halliday, REALTORS® and every client relationship. She works tirelessly for her clients to create opportunities and make the process as stress-free as possible. Throughout her 20+ years in the corporate world, Barbara expertly guided several companies through periods of sustained growth and profitability. Her experience as a Business Manager, Sr. Financial Specialist, and CPA empowers Barbara to give her real estate clients the most thorough professional service and guidance from all aspects of a home sale and purchase. A Plano resident since 2000 after relocating from the Midwest, Barbara's acumen of the market landscape proves an invaluable aspect of service to her clients. Whether it's a suburban residence in Plano or a chic townhome in Uptown, Barbara provides in-depth market data and logistic knowledge ensuring her clients are highly informed about their decision-making process. Contact Barbara for a consultation to discuss your real estate needs, choices and options.

title: REALTOR
description: Client care is my number one goal. Trusted, professional, dedicated, knowledgeable, and concerned. My success in real estate is based on total service to my clients and my ability to make buyers and sellers feel comfortable and their real estate experience positive and exciting. My negotiating skills and unparalleled work ethic have brought me referral upon referral from a diverse clientele of corporate executives to first-time buyers. Your home is one of life's major investments. I am dedicated to helping make your experience enjoyable and stress-free. When you are ready to buy or sell a home and looking for a full-time REALTOR®, call me and I promise you top notch service!
Designations: GRI, SFR

title: REALTOR
description: Whether you are buying or selling, I promise to give you the special attention you would expect of a dedicated real estate professional. My desire to serve my client's own particular needs coupled with my market expertise, construction knowledge and superior negotiating skills set me apart. I believe in building a relationship with my clients based on truthfulness and integrity, looking out for their best interests. I know how important consistent communication, strong attention to detail, and great customer service is to ensure a positive experience for my clients and in closing a transaction successfully.

I am a multi-million dollar producer with 20 years’ experience in real estate. As a Texas native, I know the Dallas/Fort Worth area well as I have lived here for the past 35 years, with 33 of those years being in sales and negotiations. Moving to Frisco in 1998, I have been a part of the northern corridor as it has grown and developed.
I am willing to go the extra mile for my clients with enthusiasm, patience, and commitment. I will work closely with you to help you achieve your goals!
Designations - CNHS, USMOM

title: REALTOR
description: Barbara is dedicated to accomplishing your real estate goals, needs and desires.  Honesty, ethics and an enthusiastic manner are her priorities.  Barbara is a Member of MetroTex Assoc of Realtors, also a Member of TAR and Nar and has been a Dallas Metroplex resident for over 30 years after relocating from Washington, D.C. and Midwest areas.  Her intuitive eye for design has taken her to many countries in Europe and Asia as an executive for Garfinckel’s, Neiman Marcus and the Bombay Company.  She developed and manufactured  decorative home accessories.  Barbara’s creative talents help her clients envision a perfect home.
*  Advanced Historic House Specialist
*  Certified New Home Specialist
*  Graduate Real Estate Institute
*  Certified International Property Specialist
*  NAR GREEN Designee
*  Extensive Marketing and Sales Background
*  CIPS – Certified International Property
Specialist
*  Accredited Staging Professional
CIPS, GRI

title: REALTOR
description: Barbara Stockon is a graduate of Tarleton State University and a longtime resident of Stephenville.
Although Barbara did not grow up in Texas, she considers herself Texan. As an educator of 35 years,
Barbara will tell you that the most important part of real estate is educating her clients about their real
estate options and leading them through the buying/selling process. Barbara loves spending time with
her husband, grandchildren and two Boxers, Opal and Mabel. Barbara has a strong background in the
horse industry through showing and rodeo. She will be your go to for buying and selling in Stephenville
and the surrounding areas.

title: REALTOR
description: A longtime North Texas resident, Barbara Whitehead has lived in Collin, Dallas, Denton, and Tarrant counties. Her firsthand knowledge of the area is enhanced by her previous experience in creating advertisements and promotional materials for numerous real estate firms, including new home builders as well as multi-family, retail, and midrise office developers. She draws on her marketing experience and graduate degree from UT Dallas to teach writing at Southern Methodist University.

Barbara brings this unique combination of skills to assist her residential real estate clients with superior service, integrity, knowledge, and insight. She is a solution-oriented individual who prioritizes each client's unique preferences, challenges, and opportunities. In short, Barbara seeks to make the process of buying and selling homes as easy, enjoyable, and rewarding as the result.
Designations - GRI

title: REALTOR
description: Whether you're buying or selling a property, I look forward to working for you, your family and friends. My 17 plus years of professional sales and customer service experience have shown me that every client's needs are different. As an agent, I work hard to provide my clients with the most positive real estate experience, taking the time to understand your needs and work tirelessly to ensure you are completely satisfied. My integrity, professional nature, positive attitude and strong work ethic balanced with my sense of humor all guarantee unwavering service to my clients.

title: REALTOR
description: A "5-Star Real Estate Agent" Award Winner and a D Magazine award winner. Barry has earned a reputation among clients and fellow Realtors for being honest, trustworthy and hardworking, as noted by a recent client, "Barry goes beyond the call of duty to serve his client's needs." He has been a top-producing agent every year of his 15+ years with the Rockwall Ebby Halliday office. He is also the exclusive listing agent for Park Place at Old Town Rockwall, a charming neighborhood of custom-built "new old" homes. With a BBA in accounting and a background as a corporate controller, Barry brings keen financial and management expertise that is beneficial to his clients. Barry has served on the Planning and Zoning Commission for the cities of both Rockwall and Heath, TX. As an Air Force veteran, Barry also enjoys working with other veterans.
Designations--REALTOR®, ABR, GRI, SFR, TAHS

title: Group
description: The Bartley Group is a full-service, full-time real estate team bringing a combined 23 years of experience to serve all your real estate needs.  Our group is lead by Linda Bartley and includes her husband, Dan and Jeneane Sanfelippo.
When it comes to helping you with either selling a house, finding your perfect home or both, we are focused on meeting and going beyond your needs and expectations.

As multimillion-dollar producers, we prioritize relationships and strive for satisfied clients. Our goal is earning your confidence and providing value now and beyond.  We will keep in touch, provide updates on the market and let you know how the economy is impacting your property.  We have an extensive network of contacts we love to provide for any of your home needs from remodeling to just needing a handyman for any ‘honey-do’ lists you may have.
The Bartley Group is ready to serve before, during and well after.
We care about your property; We care about YOU
